entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with wet snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
